summary: This is an email from a Bureau of Prisons official to a Warden, summarizing conversations with two of Jeffrey Epstein's attorneys on August 9, 2019. It discusses Epstein's requests regarding housing and water access in an attorney conference, and notes the denial of requests to house him alone in SHU due to his prior suicide attempt/gesture.

events.title: Attorney Conversations Regarding Epstein's Housing
events.description: The author of the email spoke with Epstein's attorneys Mariel Colon and Michael Miller regarding Epstein's requests for access to water in attorney conference and housing considerations.

events.title: Email Summary to Warden
events.description: An email is sent to the Warden summarizing the previous day's conversations with Epstein's attorneys and the decisions made regarding his housing.

keyFacts: On August 9, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein's attorneys made requests regarding his housing and access to water during attorney conferences.
The Bureau of Prisons denied a request to house Epstein in the Cadre because he was a pretrial inmate.
The Bureau of Prisons denied a request to house Epstein alone in SHU (Special Housing Unit) due to his prior suicide attempt/gesture.
The email, dated August 10, 2019, indicates ongoing management of Epstein's custody conditions just days before his death on August 10, 2019.
